channel.title: retrogasmic – First Time Flowing
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: Retrogasmic 1.6 – All Good Things
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: My sixth and final column for Secure Immaturity is now up. This is more of a hands-on demonstration than an actual column, an evasive technique which has served me since grade school. Read it here.
item.content:encoded:
My sixth and final column for Secure Immaturity is now up. This is more of a hands-on demonstration than an actual column, an evasive technique which has served me since grade school.

Read it here.

item.title: Retrogasmic 1.5 – Might As Well Jump
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: New Retrogasmic column up at Secure Immaturity. This one’s on Dragon’s Lair and games with quick time events. Check it out!
item.content:encoded:
New Retrogasmic column up at Secure Immaturity. This one’s on Dragon’s Lair and games with quick time events.

Check it out!

item.title: Retrogasmic 1.4 – You Have the Power of Ameritrash
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Visit the Secure Immaturity site to read my latest article on early Ameritrash board games and the geek who loved them. As usual, please comment at the Secure Immaturity site.
item.content:encoded:
Visit the Secure Immaturity site to read my latest article on early Ameritrash board games and the geek who loved them.

As usual, please comment at the Secure Immaturity site.

item.title: Retrogasmic 1.3 – My Primitive Ancestry
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: My latest article is up at Secure Immaturity. It is on early, pre-graphic games and their modern descendants. I’ve closed comments here to encourage responses at the Secure Immaturity site.
item.content:encoded:
My latest article is up at Secure Immaturity. It is on early, pre-graphic games and their modern descendants.

I’ve closed comments here to encourage responses at the Secure Immaturity site.

item.title: Retrogasmic 1.2 – Once Upon A Time There Was No World Wide Web
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I’ve posted a new article for the Secure Immaturity podcast and website. This one is about life online pre-World Wide Web. Read it here.
item.content:encoded:
